notes: Training data for the WMT 2017 Automatic post-editing task (the same used for the Sentence-level Quality Estimation task). They consist in 11,000 English-German triplets (source, target and post-edit) belonging to the IT domain and already tokenized. All data is provided by the EU project QT21 (http://www.qt21.eu/).
title: WMT17 En-De APE Shared Task Data
